github.copilot.chat.codeGeneration.instr.text: Always add a comment: 'Generated by Copilot'.
In TypeScript always use underscore for private field names.
For all Python FastAPI implementations, adhere to PEP 8 style guidelines for code formatting, except when using black, which may override some conventions.
For database operations with SQLAlchemy, ensure to utilize the session-based approach for handling transactions rather than the autocommit or autoflush patterns used in some SQL libraries.
Use python-jose for JWT creation and verification, replacing traditional methods used in Node.js with jsonwebtoken.
Implement custom exception handlers in FastAPI to manage different error types, ensuring comprehensive error reporting similar to Node.js middleware strategies.
Structure API routes with clear prefix definitions such as `/api/users` for user-related operations and `/api/cart` for shopping cart operations, ensuring a clean and navigable API architecture.
Maintain test coverage with pytest for all routes and functionalities migrated from Node.js to Python FastAPI, ensuring that all features operate as expected post-migration.
